Opportunity: Application-Adaptive Architectures

  • Exploit architectural “low-hanging” fruits

    • performance variation across applications (10-100X)
    • performance variation across data-sets (10X)

  • Use interconnect and data-path reconfiguration to

    • increase performance
    • combat performance fragility and
    • improve fault tolerance

  • Configurable hardware is used to improve utilization of performance critical resources

    • instead of using configurable hardware to build additional resources
    • design goal is to achieve peak performance across applications
    • configurable hardware leveraged in efficient utilization of performance critical resources
